dmca.title: Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: SandHlaw@aol.com [mailto:SandHlaw@aol.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2007 1:38 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: rob@pixabit.com; RKEM98@aol.com
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

        This office represents Mr. Robert Moran, Jr. who owns and
operates the domain Mafiabattle.net, which is an online game based
around a Mafia theme.  It is a text-based role-playing game.  Mr. Moran
is the sole owner of Mafiabattle.net and underlying intellectual
property, including script, trade dress and customer list.

 

        We have received information that the domain Ruletheseas.com,
which appears to be on servers under your control, is using stolen
script and intellectual property of Mafiabattle.net.  The co-owner and
co-operator of Ruletheseas.com, Mr. Zakk Martindale, was for a short
time a consultant to Mafiabattle.net.  It was during that exposure that
Mr. Martindale appears to have stolen the intellectual property
belonging to my client and used it to set up Ruletheseas.com.

 

1.  Identification of intellectual property:

 

        Mafiabattle.net and related script, trade dress and customer
list.  The owner of this intellectual property is Robert Moran, Jr.

 

2.  Infringing material or activity found at the following location:

 

        Ruletheseas.com.

 

3.  Statement of Authority:

 

        The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify
under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of
Mafiabattle.net, the owner of the intellectual property identified
above.  I have a good-faith belief that none of the infringing materials
or activities listed above have been authorized by Mr. Moran, his
agents, or the law.

 

        We hereby give notice of these infringing activities to you and
request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to
the infringing material identified above, and thereby prevent the
further illegal exploitation of the intellectual property of my client
via your company's network.

 

        We appreciate your cooperation in this matter.  Please advise me
regarding what actions you take.

 

 
Yours sincerely,

 

 
William S. Harris

 

William S. Harris
1499 Huntington Drive, Suite 403
South Pasadena, CA 91030
phone: 626-441-9300
fax: 626-441-9301
email: SandHlaw@aol.com

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This communication with its contents may contain
confidential and/or legally privileged information. It is solely for the
use of the intended recipient(s). Unauthorized interception, review, use
or disclosure is prohibited and may violate applicable laws including
the Electronic Communications Privacy Act. If you are not the intended
recipient, please contact the sender and destroy all copies of the
communication.
dmca.principal_name: William S. Harris (For Robert Moran, Jr.)
